Segment.name: G82
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying numbers, dates, and other basic data relating to the transaction set

Field.name: CreditDebitFlagCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

Field.name: SuppliersDeliveryReturnNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number assigned by the supplier to the transaction

Field.name: DUNSNumber1
Field.comment: Identifying number assigned by Dun & Bradstreet (Data Universal Numbering System)

Field.name: ReceiversLocationNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the customer that when combined with receiver Duns number uniquely identifies the receiving location

Field.name: DUNSNumber2
Field.comment: Identifying number assigned by Dun & Bradstreet (Data Universal Numbering System)

Field.name: SuppliersLocationNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by supplier that provides uniqueness when combined with sender Duns number

Field.name: PhysicalDeliveryOrReturnDate
Field.comment: Actual or intended date of physical delivery or return expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ProductOwnershipTransferDate
Field.comment: Date which is meaningful for both supplier and distributor for various mutually defined purposes (i.e., date of product ownership transfer) expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

Field.name: PurchaseOrderDate
Field.comment: Date assigned by the purchaser to Purchase Order expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ShipmentMethodOfPayment
Field.comment: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

Field.name: CodMethodOfPaymentCode
Field.comment: Code indicating method of payment acceptable for C.O.D. charge collection
